channel.title: [Delta] Fixing trade button in chat
channel.description:
I have a problem with my trade. When you trade someone you have to trade them via 'Right-Click>Trade' because the Trading message sent when you wish to trade with someone doesn't work well if you click it nothing happens. Im confused on how to fix this ?.
Just reply if you can't understand what i wrote. Neither can I :L
Cheaarz

item.title: [Delta] Fixing trade button in chat
item.dc:creator: @DefinateX DefinateX
item.description:
